Posts.EditableText:
Hello for all.

Since a few week ago in home page have a new block: Last Played. This block show the last played games. For this block, dont count Sandpit and Work In Progress. As well if a game is played many time in a short time, only appears one time.

We want to think that it is help other users to know new games played by community.

We hope this new functionality is well received and that all of you can enjoy it.

Any suggestions here are for reading, thank you and greetings!
Posts.HTML:
Hello for all.

Since a few week ago in home page have a new block: Last Played. This block show the last played games. For this block, dont count Sandpit and Work In Progress. As well if a game is played many time in a short time, only appears one time.

We want to think that it is help other users to know new games played by community.

We hope this new functionality is well received and that all of you can enjoy it.

Any suggestions here are for reading, thank you and greetings!

Posts.EditableText: That should help a lot with discovery. Too bad it's just a single slot in the sidebar though, I nearly missed it.
Posts.HTML: That should help a lot with discovery. Too bad it's just a single slot in the sidebar though, I nearly missed it.

Posts.EditableText: Perhaps better to leave out unlisted games as well?
